author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:
Adding eval="true" in the PPS xml files, as requested in

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/5954#issuecomment-645925272

#### PR validation:
Tests passed  and the new files were tested again in the PPS simulation, producing properly the hits as expected.
title: Adding eval=true in ConstantsSection in all PPS xml files
